abstract: Observer Media Group will join forces with Wendoh Media, a Las Vegas-based publisher, to create Vegas Seven, a free newspaper about life in that city.
snippet: Observer Media Group will join forces with Wendoh Media, a Las Vegas-based publisher, to create Vegas Seven, a free newspaper about life in that city.
lead_paragraph: The New York Observer is very much a creature of its home town, devoted to telling knowing tales of the city’s power structures. When it branched out with a new publication last year, it was not to another city, but to another slice of the Apple — real estate. So what’s next?

headline.main: New York Observer to Help Create Las Vegas Weekly
